attributes.description:
LIMITED EDITION - STORMTRAK

The new Ranger Stormtrak follows the same recipe as the highly successful limited-edition Thunder, by elevating the style, sophistication and exclusivity of our most luxuriously appointed model in the Ranger line-up! Be unique and turn eyes in this attractive model. Prepare to be the envy of them all! For work, play and everything in-between. Get the Ford Ranger Stormtrak!

In house finance is available. All trade ins are welcomed. Nationwide delivery can be arranged. price only valid with Ford Credit finance.

attributes.description:
Electronic Parking Brake (EPB), Auto Hold, Smart Start-stop, Tilt & Telescopic Steering, Front Mcpherson & Rear Multi-link Suspension, Driving & Terrain Modes (Standard, Eco, Sports, Snow,  Dynamic Steering Modes (Sport, Comfort, Light), Speed Sensitive Electric Steering, 225/55 R18 Alloy Wheels,Panoramic Sunroof, Roof Rails, Rain-sensing Wipers, , Leather Steering Wheel, Keyless Entry & Push Button Start, Heated Front Seats, Head-Up Display, Driver Fatigue Alert, Anti-Theft Alarm System, Radio With FM/AM, 12.3" Color Multi-touch Screen, Front & Rear Dual USB Ports, Bluetooth Connectivity, 8 Speaker: 4 Trebles,2 Bass & 2 Full Range, Speed Sensitive Volume Control, Carplay & Android Auto, Rear Privacy Glass, Electronic Anti-glare Inside Mirror, All Windows One Touch Up/Down, Remote Window Close Function, Heated Exterior Mirror, Electrically Adjustable Exterior Mirror, Electrically Retractable Exterior Mirror, Led Headlights & Taillamps, Electric Height-adjusting Headlights, Automatic Headlights + Follow Me Home, Front Fog Lamp (LED), Rear Fog Lamp (LED), Daytime Running Lamps (LED Integrated),Vanity Mirrors (Driver And Passenger), Paddle Shift, Front 12v Power Outlet, Rear Luggage 12v Power Outlet, Dashcam Power Outlet, 10.25 Inch Color Combination Instrument, Leather Seats, Driver Lumbar Support 2 Way Electric Adjust, Driver Seat 6 Way Electric Adjust, 60:40 Split With Folding Rear Seats, 6 Airbags: Dual + Side + Curtain Airbags, Child Safety Lock & Isofix, Electronic Stability System (ESC) & Traction Control (TCS), Anti-roll System (RMI) + Secondary Collision Mitigation (SCM), Cornering Brake Control (CBC) & Brake Assist (BA), Hill Decent (HDC) & Uphill Assist (HHC), Tire Pressure Monitoring System (TPMS), Front Parking Sensors (2), Rear Parking Sensors (4), 360 Degree Camera With Panoramic View, Adaptive Cruise Control (ACC) With Intelligent Cruise,Intelligent Cornering & Traffic Jam Assist, Pre-collision Warning & Automatic Emergency Braking (AEB Pedestrian And Cyclist), Lane Departure Alert (LDW), Lane Keeping Assist (LKA) And Lane Centre Keeping (LCK), Traffic Sign Recognition (TSR),  Lane Change Assist, Automatic Dual Zone Aircon, Rear Aircon Vents

5yrs/100 000 waranty 
5yrs/ 60 000 service plan
